epic_title: Secure Multi-Factor Authentication and Access Control
title: Implement multi-factor authentication for user verification
description: As a user, I want secure multi-factor authentication, so that I can protect my account with enhanced security layers.
attributes_and_rules: The multi-factor authentication should support passwords, OTPs, and optional biometric credentials. It must ensure bank-grade encryption for stored and transmitted data.
acceptance_criteria:
1. The system must allow users to configure multi-factor authentication using at least two methods.
2. The authentication process should be encrypted following bank-grade standards.
test_cases: Given a user, when they set up multi-factor authentication, then they should be able to choose between passwords, OTPs, and biometric credentials.

epic_title: Responsive Interface and Personalized User Dashboard
title: Develop a responsive user interface for all devices
description: As a user, I want a responsive interface, so that I can access services seamlessly across all my devices.
attributes_and_rules: The user interface should adapt to desktop, tablets, and mobile devices. It should ensure UI consistency and accessibility.
acceptance_criteria:
1. The interface should dynamically adapt to various screen sizes and orientations.
2. The UI must remain accessible and consistent across all platforms.
test_cases: Given a user, when they access the interface from different devices, then it should render appropriately for each device while maintaining functionality and accessibility.

epic_title: Responsive Interface and Personalized User Dashboard
title: Create a personalized dashboard with user-specific services and insights
description: As a user, I want a personalized dashboard, so that I can view my account details and customized recommendations.
attributes_and_rules: The dashboard should include individual account details, financial products, and personalized recommendations based on customer profiles.
acceptance_criteria:
1. The dashboard must display up-to-date account details and personalized recommendations.
2. The recommendations should be relevant to the user's profile.
test_cases: Given a user, when they access their dashboard, then it should show up-to-date and personalized information based on their profile.

epic_title: Core Banking System Integration and Independent Database Setup
title: Develop integration with core banking systems using secured APIs
description: As a bank developer, I want secure integration with core banking systems, so that data exchange is reliable and safe.
attributes_and_rules: Integration must employ secured APIs and message queues ensuring data integrity and reliability.
acceptance_criteria:
1. The system must securely exchange data with core banking systems.
2. It should employ secured APIs and maintain data integrity.
test_cases: Given a bank developer, when they configure the API integration, then data should be exchanged securely with core banking systems, ensuring integrity.

epic_title: Core Banking System Integration and Independent Database Setup
title: Implement an independent performance-optimized database layer
description: As a bank developer, I want an optimized database layer, so that the portal retains performance while managing high data volumes.
attributes_and_rules: The database layer should handle caching, request management, and analytics efficiently.
acceptance_criteria:
1. The dedicated database must be optimized for high performance.
2. It should handle caching, request management, and analytics effectively.
test_cases: Given a bank developer, when they set up the database layer, then it should maintain high performance and manage data efficiently.

epic_title: Digital Account Opening and Service Request Workflows
title: Create guided workflows for digital account opening
description: As a user, I want to open accounts digitally, so that I can complete the process online easily.
attributes_and_rules: Workflows must be interactive, auto-save data, pre-fill information for returning users, and validate inputs.
acceptance_criteria:
1. The workflow must guide users through account opening steps.
2. Data should auto-save and pre-fill for returning users.
test_cases: Given a user, when they begin the account opening process, then the workflow should guide them effectively, validating inputs and saving data.

epic_title: Digital Account Opening and Service Request Workflows
title: Develop workflows for digital service change requests
description: As a user, I want to submit service change requests online, so that I can update my services without visiting a branch.
attributes_and_rules: Service change workflows must include eligibility checks and real-time verification against core records.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Users must be able to submit service change requests digitally.
2. Requests should include eligibility checks and real-time verification.
test_cases: Given a user, when they submit a service change request, then the system should validate eligibility and verify the information in real-time.

epic_title: Document Upload and Digital File Management
title: Implement secure document upload for banking documentation
description: As a user, I want to upload necessary documents securely, so that my application process is quick and safe.
attributes_and_rules: Document upload should validate file size, format, and authenticity, and ensure encryption both in transit and storage.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Users must be able to securely upload required documents.
2. Uploads should validate file size, format, and authenticity, and be encrypted.
test_cases: Given a user, when they upload a document, then the system should validate the file and ensure it's encrypted during transit and storage.

epic_title: Real-Time Status Tracking and Automated Notifications
title: Enable real-time tracking of requests and applications
description: As a user, I want to track my application status in real-time, so that I stay informed about its progress.
attributes_and_rules: Status tracking must provide up-to-date information about ongoing applications and requests.
acceptance_criteria:
1. The system must present real-time status updates of user requests.
2. Users should be able to view progress at any stage.
test_cases: Given a user, when they check their application status, then the system should provide real-time updates of its progress.

epic_title: Real-Time Status Tracking and Automated Notifications
title: Develop an event-driven notification system for status changes
description: As a user, I want to receive notifications about status changes, so that I stay updated without having to check manually.
attributes_and_rules: Notifications must be delivered via email or SMS based on user preferences, and should ensure privacy and security.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Users should receive automated notifications for status changes.
2. Notifications must align with user preferences and ensure data privacy.
test_cases: Given a user, when there is a status change in their application, then the system should send a notification via the chosen channel ensuring privacy.

epic_title: User Activity History and Audit Reporting
title: Record user activity history for transparency
description: As a user, I want to view my activity history, so that I can track all my past actions on the portal.
attributes_and_rules: The activity history must summarize all user actions, requests, and outcomes securely.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Users should have access to a comprehensive view of their activity history.
2. The history must include all actions, requests, and outcomes.
test_cases: Given a user, when they view their activity history, then it should display all past actions and outcomes comprehensively.

epic_title: User Activity History and Audit Reporting
title: Implement backend audit reporting for compliance
description: As an administrator, I want detailed audit reports, so that I can ensure compliance and track user activities.
attributes_and_rules: Audit reports must be detailed, immutable, and retrievable for regulatory inspection.
acceptance_criteria:
1. The audit reporting system must record user activities in detail.
2. Reports should be immutable and available for regulatory purposes.
test_cases: Given an administrator, when they generate an audit report, then it should provide detailed, immutable records of user activities for compliance.

epic_title: Role-Based Access Control and Privilege Management
title: Develop a role-based access control framework
description: As an administrator, I want role-based access control, so that I can manage permissions dynamically based on user roles.
attributes_and_rules: RBAC must manage permissions for different user types with granular access rules.
acceptance_criteria:
1. The system should allow administrators to manage permissions dynamically.
2. Granular access rules must be defined and enforced based on roles.
test_cases: Given an administrator, when they set up RBAC, then they should be able to manage permissions for different user roles dynamically.

epic_title: Data Security, Privacy, and Compliance Governance
title: Implement data protection protocols for compliance
description: As a compliance officer, I want robust data protection protocols, so that customer data is secure and meets regulatory standards.
attributes_and_rules: Protocols must include encryption, intrusion detection, vulnerability assessments, and compliance monitoring.
acceptance_criteria:
1. The system must implement strong data protection protocols.
2. It should include encryption, intrusion detection, and other measures ensuring compliance.
test_cases: Given a compliance officer, when they review data protection protocols, then they should find strong security measures ensuring compliance with standards.
